text: Leopoldo Jesús Posada Hernández (April 1, 1936 – June 23, 2022) was a Cuban- American professional baseball outfielder. He played for the Kansas City Athletics of Major League Baseball from 1960 through 1962. Posada died on June 23, 2022 in Miami, Florida from pancreatic cancer, aged 86.Leo Posada, obituary ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Kansas City Athletics players Category:Sportspeople from Miami Category:Sportspeople from Havana
title: Leo Posada
